author: Alice O'Connor
title: GOG Galaxy adding cloud saves, for old games too
text: Cloud saves and built-in screenshotting — two of my favourite Steam favourites — are coming to GOG Galaxy, the optional client from the virtuous virtual vendor of video games. Never needing to hunt down and back up saves or install FRAPS (or whatever the heck kids use these days) is still such a wonderful convenience. These features and more will come to GOG Galaxy when it officially leaves beta with Update 1.2 in April. Unlike Steam’s cloud saves, Galaxy’s will even games not made to support ’em, including old ones. I still mourn lost Planescape: Torment saves so this sounds grand. … [ visit site to read more ]
